content:
clustermesh-apiserver completion powershell 
 Generate the autocompletion script for powershell 
 Synopsis 
 Generate the autocompletion script for powershell. 
 To load completions in your current shell session: 
 clustermesh-apiserver completion powershell | Out-String | Invoke-Expression
 
 To load completions for every new session, add the output of the above command
to your powershell profile. 
 clustermesh-apiserver completion powershell [flags]
 
 Options 
   -h, --help              help for powershell
      --no-descriptions   disable completion descriptions
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 clustermesh-apiserver completion 	 - Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
